name: Aircraft io shoot
description:
Aircraft.io shooting game is an addictive new mobile game that combines the classic game of snake with elements. Drawi an aircraft plane，try to survive in this Chaos war.

Join the next trend aircraft.io combat in the space. Move your aircraft free to get the proof, shield, missile or the life. Easy to control but hard to observe the high score.

Excited aircraft shooting game. Fast moving, avoid to be shooted. shoot your opponent and overtake their spaceships to grow your fleet. can you build the biggest fleet to dominate the space.io game war?

In aircraft.io, regardless of the size of your wings, chase the top scores to earn more points to climb up the scoreboard. shooting the best players to death to get double scroe and coins, use coins to get anther top aircraft. Each plane has their own ability. Try to get the plane you like and be the best pilot.

airecraft.io shoot features:
.Aircraft.io free game
.Auto-grow and Auto-shoot toggles
.Avoid to be shooted
.Fast move
.Smooth control on mobile
.Get high score

Once you start, you are not gonna stop.
